description.0: Character EXP, used to level up characters.
Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.
Small talent points (Including the main character)
Large talent points (Including the main character)
Companionship EXP. Used to increase Friendship levels.
Used to vitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms, allowing access to the treasures they hold. Energy regenerates over time.
description.1: It is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

description.0: A key used to unlock Story Quests.
description.1: Obtained by completing the required number of Daily Commissions.

description.0: A collection of celestial energy.
description.1: Can be exchanged for treasure during the "Unreconciled Stars" event.

description.0: Distilled celestial energy.
description.1: Can be exchanged for valuable treasure during the "Unreconciled Stars" event.
description.2: The essence of a faraway star. The power emanating from within is warm to the touch.

description.0: A collection of vital energy that exudes a faint glimmer of light.
description.1: Can be exchanged for treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

description.0: A collection of vital energy that exudes a gentle warmth.
description.1: Can be exchanged for precious treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

description.0: A wondrous energy capable of reviving and mutating a withered Cryo Regisvine.
description.1: Can be exchanged for invaluable treasure during the event "The Chalk Prince and the Dragon."

description.0: An ancient type of coinage that Ulman is collecting. Perhaps he may offer you something in exchange for Iron Coins.
description.1: Long ago, there was once an organization that attempted to found their own nation. These coins were the nation's minted currency at the time.

description.0: Jade talismans that can be obtained during Lantern Rite. The people of Liyue believe that these talismans can bring and defend peace. You might be able to exchange these for some things during Lantern Rite...
The festive mood during Lantern Rite. Perhaps the atmosphere on the day of the Rite will be better the higher the Festive Fever is...
A resource used to build all manner of mechanisms in the Theater Mechanicus. Still, the word "veneficus" itself seems to come from some old book...
Take part in the celebratory activities of the Windblume Festival to obtain these tickets and exchange them in the event shop for rewards.
description.1: The people of Mondstadt are fun-loving by nature, and they have a celebration for the seasons, the harvests of different crops, and the anniversaries of events of historic significance. Perhaps there might be a festival to commemorate the outlander who repelled Stormterror someday...?

description.0: Take part in the Windblume Festival event Domain to obtain these coupons and exchange them in the event shop for rewards.
description.1: This Domain of exceeding peculiarity is also part of the Windblume Festival celebrations, and it displays the fun-loving nature of Mondstadt's people.

description.0: The true heart of an Oceanid. This item is truly hard to find, for one must become one with the waters to truly perceive the heart of the springs.
Accumulate this to increase your Trust Rank.

Irminsul Fruit fragment data that you have obtained via calculations and analysis performed by the Energy Amplifier. It contains a vast bounty of knowledge that may yet lead to surprising gains if you use it well.
The currency that is awarded for participating in Windtrace.
description.1: The "background settings" of this same game will change in different areas. Though it is still a game of chase-and-catch, the fleeing party are named the "Rebels" in Mondstadt, while their pursuer is the "Hunter," symbols both of the ancient resistance and oppression.
description.2: Of course, the children of Mondstadt know well that this is just a game, and no true sense of enmity emerges as they play.

description.0: Shells brought in by the tide that shine gorgeously, filled with the breath of the sea.
description.1: Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Midsummer Island Adventure" event.

description.0: These crystal-clear marbles have a bright feather sealed within them, making them miniature harpasta that are easy to collect.
description.1: Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Midsummer Island Adventure" event.

description.0: Intricately crafted parts from Dodofortresses that look rather valuable. Can be exchanged for rewards.
A shard of concentrated violet lightning, fizzing with strange Electro energy. Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Thunder Sojourn" event.
A crystal formed from concentrated violet lightning, fizzing with strange Electro energy. Can be exchanged for valuable treasure during the event "Thunder Sojourn" event.
Accumulate this to raise your Mastery Level. Raise your Mastery Level to obtain new Mechanici and Wondrous Sticks.
A mysterious talisman obtained by playing Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders. Exchange them with Komakata for some precious items.
Moonchase Festival Festive Fever

Shikifuda that have become terribly tattered. The intricate, esoteric charms have long ago become blurred and cannot be used in combat. However, the energy within these shikifuda is still sufficient to activate Charm Emplacements.
description.1: Use these items in the Labyrinth Warriors event to re-draw Charms.

description.0: Shikigami replicas whose charm magic has long since faded. They cannot reawaken Shiki Taishou's memories, but if gathered together, they can still help him reclaim his past power.
description.1: Use these items in the Labyrinth Warriors event to enhance Shiki Taishou's abilities.

description.0: Leftover wooden military ID tokens that record the names of the warriors who once fought within the Mystic Onmyou Chamber.
description.1: Exchange these items in the Labyrinth Warriors event for valuable treasure.

description.0: An insignia given to those who complete the special training conducted by the Adventurers' Guild. It can be considered a symbol of one's strength.
A precious insignia obtained from conquering a great trial. These emblems won't morph into anything else... Right?
A wondrous talisman said to be able to connect people to "fortune." In Liyue Harbor, many children are asked by their parents to carry this sort of talisman with them all the time.
An exquisite talisman that seems quite valuable. You should be able to exchange this for certain items...
A strange talisman that appeared out of nowhere on your person. You can still feel powerful emotions emanating vaguely from this talisman when you hold it tight...

A stone that gives off a strange radiance. It can only be found in a separate part of The Chasm, and its origins and composition are both unknown. However, it has strange and unique properties: When it falls, it maintains a regular shape and its cross-section still keeps its mirrored sheen. Those of these rocks that are older may have witnessed that ancient battle.
description.1: These stones can be exchanged for treasures during "Perilous Trail."

description.0: The shell of some sea creature, hard in texture and scattered in the Golden Apple Archipelago. As if affected by a certain power, its surface loses all its natural patterns and becomes iridescent instead.
description.1: Can be exchanged for treasure during "Summertime Odyssey."

description.0: A crystal that contains a deep and subtle power. Much like Cor Lapis, it has a pure Geo-gold hue. Its power can be activated to some extent within this space under The Chasm, thus helping to defeat monsters.
description.1: This can be used in the "Realms of Guile and War" of "Perilous Trails" to draw Stratagems or allow characters who have fallen to take to the field once again.

description.0: After much discussion with your companions during the adventure, you summed up some thoughtful suggestions on how Aranara Carvings can become more popular. Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Graven Innocence" event.
A quick sketch of inspirations for "Aranara Carvings" made during the adventure. Can be exchanged for precious treasures during the "Graven Innocence" event.
Ancient iron currency which, according to Ulman, is worth an awful lot of money. However, it doesn't feel like anything special to the touch...

Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

A sizable amount of Fairbrew Jelly, representing the sum total of your earnings in this charity event. As the Weinlesefest draws to a close, Bernhard will exchange these for Mora to give to old folks and children who need it.
A sizable amount of Fairbrew Jelly, representing the base capital used in setting up your shop.
description.1: Attracting customers and increasing earnings — these two are the key goals of all shopkeepers. As such, you must plan out your spending and increase the attractiveness of your shop.

description.0: Materials that contain various theories and case studies related to mercantile practice. To those with the appropriate experience, every page and every word is filled with possible inspiration for ways to improve.
A finely-crafted memorial coin, and the reward given to outstanding participants in the Fungus Capture and Coruscating Potential stages of the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament.
description.1: No matter the results of the competition, these coins are proof of the friendly associations between the participants and the tame Fungi.
description.2: These coins can be used to exchange for precious items during the "Fabulous Fungus Frenzy" event.

description.0: A medal made from unique materials, and the reward given to outstanding participants in the Special Training stage of the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament.
description.1: Working together to defeat powerful enemies in the Special Training grounds is one of the key aspects to nurturing the bond between you and your Fungi friends and growing stronger together.
description.2: These coins can be used to exchange for precious items during the "Fabulous Fungus Frenzy" event.

description.0: A mysterious crystalline substance that you obtained after defeating the mighty Hypostases within a heretofore undiscovered Domain. Its lovely colors are like the remnant light of the elements as they are scattered.
description.1: Can be used to exchange for valuable resources in the event "Hypostatic Symphony: Dissonant Verse"

description.0: Ticket earned from a participant's display of courage and insight by completing special challenges in the "Test of Courage" event hosted by the Yashiro Commission.
description.1: You can exchange these tickets for rewards during the "Akitsu Kimodameshi" event.

description.0: You can obtain these reward coupons by playing games of Floral Chess during the Windblume Festival. During the event, you can exchange them for rewards.
Wisdom Gala Excitement
You can obtain these reward tickets by taking part in the various festivities during the Windblume Festival. During the event, you can exchange them for rewards.
You can obtain these coupons after participating in various events at the King of Invokations Grand Prix. During the event, you can exchange them for rewards.
Vouchers found inside Voucher Boxes throughout the Veluriyam Mirage. They are exquisitely made and come in vivid colors. Just gripping them in your hand seems to impart the joy of winning a reward.
description.1: Can be used to unlock valuable rewards during the "Secret Summer Paradise" event.

description.0: A crystal that radiates a magnificent luster. Looking upon it for a time will bring back fun memories of taking part in various games. With so many interesting sights to be seen within the Veluriyam Mirage, is it strange that such vast quantities of joy would crystallize into a pure gemstone?
description.1: Can be used to unlock valuable rewards during the "Secret Summer Paradise" event.

description.0: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
An energy crystal from the very origin of the universe. Formed from within nothingness out of pure potential and hope, it contains enough energy to create a newborn star.
Currency of the realm. Used within the Serenitea Pot to exchange for various items.
A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you ancient treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.
A crystal that temporarily revitalizes Irminsul to grant you great treasures. The energy within regenerates over time.
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
description.1: Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

description.0: Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
description.1: Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

description.0: A fateful stone that connects dreams.
description.1: Its glimmers can entwine fates and connect dreams, just as how its glimmers links stars into the shapes of a heart's desires.

description.0: A seed that lights up the night.
description.1: No matter the distance apart, guided by the stone's glimmer, the fated will meet under the stars.

description.0: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.
A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.
A sigil that serves as a sign of recognition from the trees, grass, and flowers in Sumeru.
description.1: Offer it to the Tree of Dreams deep in the woods to receive the rewards from the forest.

description.0: A sigil that serves as a sign of the acknowledgment given by the thundering islands of Inazuma.
description.1: Offer them to the Sacred Sakura of the Grand Narukami Shrine to raise your Sacred Sakura's Favor level.

description.0: An insignia that shows the recognition of the winds of Mondstadt.
description.1: Can be exchanged for special items in Mondstadt.

description.0: A token of recognition and appreciation that can be found around Mondstadt. Can be exchanged for rare items in the shop.
An insignia that shows the recognition of the cliffs of Liyue.
description.1: Can be exchanged for special items in Liyue.

description.0: Increases your Reputation Lv. (Inazuma)
Increases your Reputation Lv. (Mondstadt)
Increases your Reputation Lv. (Sumeru)
Increases your Reputation Lv. (Liyue)
The missing star from the Talents of a Pyro-aligned Traveler.
The missing star from the Talents of a Hydro-aligned Traveler.
The missing star from the Talents of a Dendro-aligned Traveler.
The missing star from the Talents of an Electro-aligned Traveler.
The missing star from the Talents of an Anemo-aligned Traveler.
The missing star from the Talents of a Cryo-aligned Traveler.
The missing star from the Talents of a Geo-aligned Traveler.
Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.
The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.
A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.
The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Akademiya to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.
A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.
Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.
An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.
The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.
A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.
Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.
One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.
A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.
Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.
A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.
A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."
The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.
An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.
A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.
A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.
A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.
No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.
A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.
An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.
A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.
The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.
A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.
A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.
A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.
The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.
An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.
Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.
A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.
The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.
A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.
A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.
Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as the "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.
The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.
Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.
A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.
The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.
The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.
A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.
The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?
Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine. Also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.
A young prodigy detective from the Tenryou Commission. His senses are sharp and his thoughts are clear.
A mysterious person who claims to work for the Ministry of Civil Affairs, but is a "non-entity" on the Ministry of Civil Affairs' list.
A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.
Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.
An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.
A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.
The capable and reliable Arataki Gang deputy leader - Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.
The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.
A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.
An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.
A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart — and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.
The star of the Zubayr Theater. She is full of warmth and innocence, and her dances are lively and elegant.

The General Mahamatra in charge of supervising the researchers of the Akademiya. It is said that when he gets down to work, the General Mahamatra is even more efficient than the "Great Vayuvyastra" made by the Kshahrewar.
A descendant of King Deshret with an amber left eye. The defender of Aaru Village.
A caged bird secluded within the confines of the Sanctuary of Surasthana who can only see the world in her dreams.

A Rtawahist student who specializes in Theoretical Astrology. Heavily prone to somnambulism and locked in a grinding war with sleep deprivation, the problem of restful slumber is a most troubling one to her.
A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.
A researcher from "one hundred years ago." She enjoys self-identifying as everyone's senior, and has significant knowledge of ancient scripts and machines of all kinds.
Streetward Rambler's youngest disciple. A gentle and caring "little adult."
The current scribe of the Sumeru Akademiya, a man endowed with extraordinary intelligence and talent. He lives free — free from the searching eyes of ordinary people, anyway.
A member of the Eremites, a mercenary organization that roams the sands of Sumeru. Valiant and powerful, she enjoys great fame amongst her fellow Eremites.
A young knight born to an ordinary family. He serves as a Front-Line Surveyor in his Company. He is a low-key and cautious character.
A renowned architect from Sumeru who perhaps cares a bit too much about too many things. He is an aesthete troubled by reality.
The owner of Bubu Pharmacy, who is rarely seen without the white snake named Changsheng. His medicinal knowledge is encyclopedic, and his personal intrigues subtle.

An early draft of a traveler's tale, recording the many things they saw on their journey across the lands. But why does it exist? It is almost as if you have been here before...
description.2: Use this item to unlock Gnostic Hymn for a single period.

BlessingOfTheWelkinMoonNewMoon.name: Blessing of the Welkin Moon - New Moon

description.0: A ritual prayer, recited on the rising of the first new moon, to ask for the moon's blessing in the form of wealth and good fortune. For your purposes, the new moon you shall pray to is the first-ever new moon in Teyvat, since it's the first one you've seen here.
description.2: Use this item to receive 30 days of Blessing of the Welkin Moon rewards.

description.0: The brush with which you may bestow a new name upon a certain person.
description.1: Once the new name has been given, it cannot be changed.

Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.
A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.
You have no idea who slipped it to you.
Items belonging to the people of Mondstadt that were previously stolen by hilichurls in Drunkard Gorge.
Made by hilichurl witch doctors. Cures hilichurl poison.
Marker indicating the finish line of the Climbing Competition.
Marker indicating the finish line of the Gliding Competition.
Awarded to the Mondstadt Gliding Competition Champion.
Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.
Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.
A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.
Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.
Can be eaten once cooked. As a spice, it can bring wonderful flavor to dishes.
A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.
Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.
A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.
A rare plant that grows on steep cliffs with nobility. Shines magnificently in the night.
Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.
A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.
A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet, refreshing taste. In the past, the storm watchers' only solace was the sweetness of this fruit and hope for the city's peace.
A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.
A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds."
A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.
A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.
A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.
A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.
An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.
A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper — like an aristocrat among the paupers.
Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.
A small flower with strong vitality. It is said that its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.
Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.
A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.
The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.
A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.
A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.
A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.
A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."
A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.
An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.
A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.
A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.
Brightly colored wings. The powder that falls from them shimmers a little. Perhaps this is what allows them to fly?
A shelled creature that lives near the ocean. Its flaky, delicious meat can easily be made into tasty dishes.
A delicacy specific to female crabs. A rare and prized ingredient that isn't quite to everyone's taste.
A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.
A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.
Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.
Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.
A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...
A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.
Common frog found in moist environments. Full of energy, they secrete a substance that will keep you full of vitality.
The light-emitting part of a firefly. Used for courtship, and in medicine to help recover strength.
A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.
A fresh fillet of fish. Handled properly, it can make a rich dish.
The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.
A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.
A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.
Freshly made bean product that has a silky-smooth tender texture.
A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.
A shiny pearl spat out by a loach that has mystical medicinal properties.
description.1: Minerals and elemental particles ingested by the loach condense into these mildly magical beads. When threatened, the loach spits them out to confuse predators and escape with its life.

description.0: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.
A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."
A whole piece of deep sea shrimp meat, full of nutrients and bursting with delicious flavor.
Rare, fresh meat.
description.1: This species of boar is recorded to have gone extinct several hundred years ago and has been preserved by the extreme temperatures on Dragonspine. For the gourmets of Teyvat, this is an ingredient of unspeakable sacrosanctness.

description.0: The fresh meat of an Unagi/Eel. If handled properly, it can be used to make fresh, lovely food.
A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.
A fresh chunk of meat that seems to be radiating an enigmatic aura. Wonder what it'll taste like?
A common fruit in Teyvat with a special aroma. It can be used to make beverages after being ground.
A few normal documents and a copy of Vera's Troubles.
Musk's Travel Journal. In the notes regarding Musk Reef is a line that reads: "Only on a morning sea breeze can one glide here from Lover's Cape..."
The first half of the sheet music for "Yellow." "S to J" is written in the bottom right corner.
The second half of the sheet music for "Yellow."

PrivateLetterFromLisaToJean.name: Private Letter from Lisa to Jean

description.0: Lisa has asked you to give this to Jean to deliver the news that Vera's Secret is receiving a sequel soon.
Tells a story in which a court mage and her King get married in the end.
Looks tasty, but is actually a weakening potion.
Lisa has asked you to give this to Barbara.
Lisa has asked you to give this to Barbara.
The poem Venti asked you to look for, though only the first part of it.
The poem Venti asked you to look for, though it would seem there is more.
The poem Venti asked you to look for, piece the three pages together to reveal a love verselet.
Ancient text engraved on the building.
Can restore those that have been transformed into hilichurls by Abyss Mages back to their human form.
Can be used for taking down Stormterror.
You didn't catch a cricket, just a hair off its leg.
Common cricket. Can be seen everywhere, nothing rare about it at all.
A big blue cricket. Seems to have a powerful bite force. Should be good at battle.
A rare cricket with seven different red and purple layers to its wings.
Oh, wow! The Legendary Golden Cricket!
Hydro Amber given to you by Venti. Can be smashed to create rainfall. (Test)
Anemo Amber given to you by Venti. Can be smashed to create air currents. (Test)
Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.
Items worth little value stolen from some random passer-by. Better return them quickly.
A teardrop crystal in which gloomy red gleams flow. Seems to have been left by the dragon. Perhaps the person that was talking with the dragon knows more about it, but where did he go?

description.0: Seal of Stormterror's Lair

BreakTheSealOfStormterrorsLair.name: Break the seal of Stormterror's Lair

description.0: Seal of Stormterror's Lair
Bring it close to your ear and it seems you can hear faint whispers, but can't make out what's being said. (Not available)
Break Seal
Break Seal
Break Seal
A curious teardrop left in the ancient arena that attracted hordes of monsters to fight for it.

PartiallyRepairedHolyLyreDerHimmel.name: Partially Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel

description.0: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, with some power restored by a Teardrop Crystal.

CompletelyRepairedHolyLyreDerHimmel.name: Completely Repaired Holy Lyre der Himmel

description.0: A treasure that once belonged to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, that has been restored to full power. Even Dvalin may heed its call.
A teardrop left behind by Dvalin. The pure power of Anemo resonates within it.
A prized treasure of Barbatos, the Anemo Archon. Its clear sound that once echoed through the heavens and was beloved by the unruly Dvalin has now been reduced to naught but dull, ear-piercing noise.
A piece of paper with clues to a treasure. On it, is an unclear map with an unclear message.
A piece of paper with clues to a treasure. On it, is an unclear map with an unclear message.
A scribbled map with a simple marking in a particular area.
A key that once belonged to the Fatui. Just like all other keys, each respond to a door.
Opens the black door.
I don't ever think the world is monotonous. It's just that interesting things happen in far away galaxies.
description.1: The great adventure of Vera, an ordinary girl always fascinated by distant lands, secretly begins.

description.0: Everything's just boring. Everything, all the time. It's not depression. It's just reaching the age of 14.
description.1: So begins Vera's adventure.

description.0: The Andromeda Empire stretches across half the galaxy group. Every planet within the Empire has its own demons and deities, dragons and monsters.
description.1: "I've come up with a story for every star from your home." "That's not possible. Looking from here, the Andromeda Galaxy is only one fifth the size of your moon."
description.2: So continues Vera's adventure.

description.0: "Have you ever thought about what our lives would've been like without the archons?"
description.1: Come and join the author in an exploration of "divinity" with humor and logic.

description.0: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years as a slave in Mondstadt.

A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years when she met Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, as well as how she defeated the drake and overthrew the Aristocrats.
Mondstadt General Goods Order Board
Cat's Tail Tavern Message Board

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaI.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (I)

description.0: "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
description.1: An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, an 11-part story, begins here.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (II)

description.0: "Be good and stay put." Trapped by a Mist Flower, what does fate have in store by the fox who met a hunter?
description.1: The story of the Hunter and the Fox continues in Part 2.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaIII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (III)

description.0: The Hunter of fruitless hunts was awoken by a commotion outside. Who is at his door?
description.1: The story of the Hunter and the Fox continues. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 3.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaV.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (V)

description.0: Upon accepting the Fox's conditions, he came to the place where all the prey who disappeared had eventually gone to — an endless field of dandelions.
description.1: The story of the Hunter and the Fox in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 5.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVI.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VI)

description.0: "Why do you want to learn the language of human?" "So I can befriend humans when I become one."
description.1: The child-like voice says, in the sea of dandelions. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 6.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaVII.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (VII)

description.0: "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
description.1: Can the Hunter also learn magic to make his wish come true? The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 7.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaX.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (X)

description.0: The somber parting has finally arrived... The Fox bids farewell to its mother, teacher, and the dandelion sea.
description.1: It's time to live up to the promise. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, Part 10.

TheFoxInTheDandelionSeaXI.name: The Fox in the Dandelion Sea (XI)

description.0: "Dandelion, Dandelion, ride the wind to a faraway land," the Fox chants.
description.1: An unforgettable Mondstadt fairytale about a hunter and a fox. The Fox in the Dandelion Sea, the final installment.

description.0: The masterpiece of the Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian! Scholar Jacob Musk will show you the mysterious spiritual world of the hilichurls through this poetry collection!
Are wine and poetry a part of the hilichurl lifestyle? Do they have pure and devout desires? Expert on the hilichurls, Jacob Musk, is here to answer!
You can't have picnics on the sides of a galactic highway! Even the deities will be held fully responsible for road accidents that might occur!
description.1: The doorway to a study in a simple village connects to anywhere in space and time! Having tea with the deities, playing hide-and-seek across time... Vera's great adventure continues!

description.0: "Vera's so beautiful, like a shining star in the universe, but I..." "Boys at this age are always more petite than girls of a similar age."
description.1: Childhood must be let go of to welcome the coming of the adolescent years. It's not too late to think about it now... Real melancholy finally hits Vera.

description.0: "It's enough. Let's go home... The furthest place I've dreamt of, is the Delphi where you are."
description.1: Though the explanation is delayed, you should know that Delphi is the center of Greek mythology. Vera's Melancholy - the perfect ending... or is it?

BreezeAmidstTheForestBalladSelectionExce.name: Breeze Amidst the Forest - Ballad Selection Excerpt

description.0: A collection of Mondstadt ballads, recorded, compiled and arranged by scholars centuries ago.
A long, long time ago, in the forest kingdom... What legends occurred there?
description.1: The Boar Princess, Part 1. A story about friendship, love, and death.

description.0: A lifeless ice field, a land even the gentle Anemo Archon has never visited. How is it that it still has its lonely inhabitants?
description.1: The Boar Princess, Part 2. The story continues on the glacier.

description.0: "Now and evermore shall you be bereft of hope." What fate awaits the wolf pup who bears such a cruel curse?
description.1: The Boar Princess, Part 3.

description.0: The wolf pup grew up in the cold loneliness. The secret past of the lone wolf is now revealed.
description.1: The Boar Princess, Part 4.

description.0: "No one deserves this fate." The good princess sheds a tear of compassion. For those who persevere as true companions, even the ice shall melt before their determination.
description.1: The Boar Princess, Part 5.

description.0: All the sacrifices made out in the frozen plains were not in vain. The perfect ending of friendship, love, life and death!
description.1: This is the end to the famous and touching story, The Boar Princess.

description.0: In the age of depression and tyranny, the outlander girl met the ominous orphan. Does this fateful encounter foretell a tragic ending?
description.1: The historic romance novel, The Mondstadt Tower, begins!

description.0: Overly Clean Cut
Seems it's been rotten for a long time.
Wonder who left it behind?

BreezeAmidstTheForestSupplementTheDragon.name: Breeze Amidst the Forest Supplement: The Dragon Tome

description.0: A supplement to the "Breeze Amidst the Forest" ballad selection with excerpts from various sources.
description.1: It tells the story of the Dragon of Mondstadt.

description.0: Seems to be a declaration of war from the Abyss Order to the "Darknight Hero." Many key phrases have been redacted.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesI.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (I)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This is part one, which tells the story of the Land of Night and the Moonlight Forest.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesII.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (II)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the meeting of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesIII.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (III)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince's decision to save the Moonlight Forest.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesIV.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (IV)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. Installment four describes the meeting between the Pale Princess, the Light Prince, and the Six Pygmies.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesV.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (V)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. In this installment, the Six Pygmies' sinister scheme starts to unfold.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesVI.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VI)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of how the Six Pygmies managed to implement their nefarious plot.

ThePalePrincessAndTheSixPygmiesVII.name: The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VII)

description.0: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. The final installment brings everything to a conclusion, and includes the Night Mother's prophecy.

The beginning of the Springvale Hunter's tragic fantasy journey. Where did misfortune first befall him? What marks the start and finish of the 1000-year journey of loneliness? Let this first volume of 1000 Years of Loneliness be your guide through the fantastical fog that is the life of Gothson.
A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler on her experiences in Mondstadt.
A book mistakenly taken by Amber... about fables?
Used to trap beasts of a certain size. If you pay attention in the wilds to collect them, you can make one like this. Set one down, and then conceal it carefully.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingceVillage.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingce Village

description.0: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It stills looks new, and smells like the fragrant herbs of Mt. Qingce.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerLuhuaPool.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Luhua Pool

description.0: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, at a makeshift camp. It seems to have been dipped in water, with the watermark of a fox's footprint.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerYaoguangShoal.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Yaoguang Shoal

description.0: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages smell like the sea breeze.
A letter treasured by Dongdong from Qingce Village. It seems to be a letter from his father.
A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Yaoguang Shoal.
(TEST) Adventure Journal Page
(TEST) Adventure Journal
Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.
A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.
A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.
A guidebook for the ones new to using wind gliders. It also serves as a mandatory reading material to get a gliding license in Mondstadt. It contains all the necessary info any user must know.
A piece of plaustrite dug up from the roots of a Bloatty Floatty. It has a rather unique color and is, perhaps, the Azurite that Wang'ya spoke of...
A piece of plaustrite plucked from a Ruin Hunter. It has a rather unique color and is, perchance, the Vermillionite that Wang'ya mentioned...
A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's unfortunate encounters at Guili Plains.
A diary left behind by someone in the wilderness that tells of the owner's adventures at Jueyun Karst.
A diary left behind by someone in Liyue that tells of the owner's adventures there.
A letter written by someone to the Treasure Hoarders about some plans for the Lantern Rite...
A Nephrite Ring obtained from a slime. Gorgeous color and clearly a top-quality item. This must be Mr. Zhu's lost property.
Crab meat that's been rolled in flour, deep fried, and then pan fried together with ginger and garlic. When you finally plate up, the crab appears to be lying on gold.

Notes penned by Leonard, an adventurer from the distant past. Clearly an ancient text, it has suffered much wear and tear. Most of the content has been lost to the ravages of time, with just a few fragments remaining.

DraftManuscriptOfHyakuninIkkiTheGreatest.name: Draft Manuscript of "Hyakunin Ikki: The Greatest Battle"

description.0: A key to the warehouse's gates kept by Wyatt. The likeliness of him losing it is next to him losing his slim wallet.
A key to the warehouse's gates kept by Wyatt. The likeliness of him losing it is next to him losing his slim wallet.
A small coin pouch of Mora that doesn't weigh much; you'd sometimes forget it's even there.
A small coin pouch of Mora that contains payment for a meal ordered at the Good Hunter. Do not take your cut out of this bag.
A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.
A sturdy plank. It feels heavy and reliable, and easy to apply to all sorts of scenarios.
A fragile wooden plank that is easily breakable. It doesn't serve much of a purpose aside from pretending that you're strong.
A bundle of sturdy ropes long enough to temporarily hold certain things together for a time, however short it may be.
A small coin pouch of Mora that doesn't weigh much; you'd sometimes forget it's even there.
Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.
A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint, and Calla Lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.
A bag that is quite heavy. Once picked up, you can't help but think of asking someone else for a hand.
TEST Processed Noctilucous Jade
A pretty and sweet cocktail. The juice slowly sinks in the clear liquor like the sunset. A favorite among couples.
Margaret's refreshing signature cocktail, popular among those who only want one drink. It also uses dandelions, but the greatest difference between this and dandelion wine is the price.
A straight liquor shot, giving you the original taste of the distilled liquor itself. One shot is enough to make your body burn.
A mellow beer with thick layer of foam on top. The flying bubbles from making toasts gave it its name.
Though the taste is acceptable, but it has lost its aesthetic value due to a mistake in the making.
It looks alright, but a mistake in the making cost it its refreshing taste.
A shot without the taste of the distilled liquor and pretty much anything else... Something must have gone wrong.
Though the taste is acceptable, but a mistake in the making cost it its texture.
A fruity cocktail, but it somehow tastes different from what Quinn described.
A drink with a messy taste, definitely not what Margaret promised.
There are tastes of different liquors aside from the distilled liquor... This is not what Draff wanted.
There are bubbles and foams, sure, but it somehow tastes different from what Jack described.
Due to mistakes made while adding ingredients, this wine has undergone some unpleasant changes...
A cocktail never before seen. Kinda makes one wanna try.
A common alcoholic drink available anywhere.

A love letter from Godwin to Glory detailing their love and the intimate things they did, which would make any reader blush. However, only the last part is somewhat memorable.
A hefty bottle that came drifting with the waves, carrying tokens of an old friendship and the hopes of being reunited.
(TEST) Klee's Notebook

Cough Syrup made from Sweet Flower that can moderately suppress cough. Due to its sweet and refreshing taste, the syrup is very popular among kids in Mondstadt. Some kids even wish they had a cough so they can get the syrup.
A letter from Draff to Sister Grace. It was tightly sealed, but it wasn't enough to withstand the brute force of the hilichurls.
All sorts of materials. These should be just enough to make a training dummy.
A thick-set letter sent back from Liyue Harbor to Sara. Several feathers are still stuck in the envelope, signifying the effort that carrier pigeon put in and the sort of treatment it received.
Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.
A letter from Guy to his father sealed as per regulation of the Knights of Favonius. It is tightly sealed to deter influence of rain and perplexity.
A list of ingredients Quinn needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?
A list of ingredients Margaret needs for her cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?
A list of ingredients Jack needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?
A list of ingredients Draff needs for his cocktail. If other ingredients are used, what kind of result could one expect?
A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler in Liyue.
A letter written by Xingqiu to the Feiyun Commerce Guild. The handwriting is so messy its barely recognizable.
A heavy bag full of Mora provided by the Feiyun Commerce Guild. Enough to purchase every Cor Lapis available in Liyue.
Mir once again chanted the forgotten spell. The maiden was reunited with him again. "So, this is what you truly look like."
description.1: "The world is beyond repair. It shall be born anew from the ashes of the last." The mad Celestial Emperor sentenced all living things of the world to a harsh punishment.
description.2: "But you, you would understand me, wouldn't you?" The nameless thief who stole the national treasure said to his lord.
description.3: "No. No apologies necessary, for you are benevolent."

description.0: An intact training dummy. Very sturdy, perfect for training.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfTheStove.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of the Stove

description.0: Stories about the Geo Archon as the God of the Stove.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonTheGroundbreaker.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: The Groundbreaker

description.0: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as The Groundbreaker.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfWealth.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of Wealth

description.0: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of Wealth.

LegendOfTheGeoArchonGodOfHistory.name: Legend of the Geo Archon: God of History

description.0: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of History.
Segments from "The Wrath of Haishan," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of The Crux...
Segments from "Ring of Raining Blades (I)," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of the Guhua Clan...
Segments from "Ring of Raining Blades (II)," mentioned by Liu Su, that features the story of the Guhua Clan...

MealBoxBySmileyYanxiaoForJiangxue.name: Meal Box by Smiley Yanxiao for Jiangxue

description.0: A tightly sealed meal box. It's quite heavy, it must contain quite a big portion.

ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleLulu.name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Lulu

description.0: An elegantly-written note by Little Lulu. It reads, "1 ship came into Liyue Harbor yesterday morning."

ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleFei.name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Fei

description.0: A scribbled note by Little Fei. It reads, "1 ship sailed out of Liyue Harbor yesterday at noon."

ALogOfShipsComingInAndOutByLittleMeng.name: A log of ships coming in and out by Little Meng

description.0: A neatly-written note by Little Meng. It reads, "No ships sailed in or out of Liyue Harbor last night."
A heavy and tightly sealed packaged with a novel written by Chang the Ninth. It seems that he doesn't want people to read his works...
A novel by Chang the Ninth. Its thickness and weight say much about the effort he put in.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerGuyunStoneFores.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Guyun Stone Forest

description.0: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald, by chance. The pages are damp and seem to have been soaked in water.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerSalTerrae.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Sal Terrae

description.0: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages are littered with a small amount of shiny but bitter salt crystals.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingyunPeakJuey.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingyun Peak, Jueyun Karst

description.0: A diary left behind by the famed adventurer, Roald. The pages have the scent of flowers that grow on cliffs.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerAocangLakeJueyu.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Aocang Lake, Jueyun Karst

description.0: A diary of the famed adventurer, Roald, left by the lake. It tells of his plans after his adventures on Mt. Aocang.
A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...
A box that's carelessly sealed. The content doesn't seem important.
A box that's tightly sealed. The content must be important...
A tightly-sealed letter packed with other supporting documents that prove the bearer of the letter to be a reliable and experienced adventurer.
A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on the legends of stone beasts.

RecordsOfJueyunPalaceBeneathTheSea.name: Records of Jueyun: Palace Beneath the Sea

description.0: A collection of folk stories, myths, and legends from Liyue. It's quite a page-turner. This segment is on ancient fictional stories.
Legend has that it contains ancient incantations used to pay respects to Rex Lapis and the yaksha adepti. It also serves as a historical record of the ancient belief in the Geo Archon.

RecordsOfTheGallantTheHermit.name: Records of the Gallant: The Hermit

description.0: A compilation of stories and legends of various knights-errant in Liyue. Some of them have been told for a long time but are still popular among the people.

A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.
A history book compiled and translated from ancient stone tablets of Liyue by the historian Zichang. It contains various fragmented historical events.
A poetry collection by Pingshan, The Mystic. The quality of the poems is all over the place, but it has long been a reference book for young poets or poet-wannabes in Liyue.

It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the social structure and characteristics of the hilichurls.

It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume features the beliefs and spiritual world of the hilichurls.

It contains the investigations and observations into the cultural customs of the hilichurls by the "Poet Laureate of Hilichurlian," Jacob Musk, a Mondstadt ecologist. This volume explores the diverse cultural customs of the hilichurls in relation to Mondstadt's.

HistoryOfKingsAndClansPrologue.name: History of Kings and Clans: Prologue

description.0: A comprehensive history of Mondstadt edited and compiled by the Northland History Society.

A history book on the life of the apical ancestor of the Gunnhildr Clan compiled by Eckhart Gunnhildr, a modern historian of Mondstadt. It consists of fragmented stories and legends from the aristocratic period.
Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's days as a knight's squire.
Ballads that have been passed down since the aristocratic period and are said to come from Ragnvindr the Dawn Knight himself. They tell of Ragnvindr's friendship with a sword-dancer.

Field-cooking skills are paramount to surviving in the wilderness. Lynn, a 10-year Adventurers' Guild veteran, teaches you how to cook delicious and fulfilling food in times of emergency in the wilderness!
A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

TreasureMapOfTheVastBlue.name: Treasure Map of The Vast Blue

description.0: A treasure map obtained from Bolai of a hidden treasure somewhere out there...

A volume out of the "Wonders and Folklore of Liyue" collection, which serves as Liyue's own version of "Tour of the Land of Liyue," an encyclopedia of folk beliefs and customs by Masudi, a scholar from Sumeru. Due to the archaic nature of the author's writing style, it was largely dismissed by the public and publishers alike. "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti" introduces the readers to the various yakshas who fought side-by-side with the Geo Archon.

The signature dish of Smiley Yanxiao, the chef of Wangshu Inn. It has a sweet taste but also retains the bitterness of the almonds. Its refreshing taste and mild fragrance shall impress even the adepti.
A package that has been left on the ground. It's not very heavy; the sound of something clattering inside can be heard when picking it up. It must contain many small objects.

A token lent out from "Childe" of the Fatui. Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.
In ancient times when Axis Mundi was unobstructed, there were nine realms, each a world of its own. The realm of humans was known as the Zhongzhou, while the gods reside in Shenxiao.
description.1: At the end of the last calamity, a war between the gods broke out. The God King fell, setting the nine realms ablaze, obliterating all living things. The realms have now been born anew, life again thrives, but the passageway between the nine realms by Axis Mundi has been sealed off.
description.2: An all-new graphic novel on the epic journey in search of the God-King's Halberd begins!

description.0: Mir, having stumbled onto the journey to retrieve the swords by accident, encountered a huge crisis before the journey had even begun. Imperial Guard and Imperial Escort elites were slain by enemies holding the Ominous Swords. Amidst grave danger, Mir recalled a spell taught by his father. Legend has that, the Celestial Emperor has a young daughter whose name was not known to the world; she now possessed Weiyang's body and revealed herself. Who would prevail? The wielders of the Ominous Swords who had turned into ferocious demons? Or Mir who could somewhat hold his own in a fight?

"Just stay with the name 'Weiyang' for convenience's sake on the road. With the official documents from the government in hand, you should be free to go as you wish throughout the kingdom." Still worried about Weiyang, Mir decided to accompany her on her journey and kill any demons they may encounter.
description.1: Though they had already collected five Ominous Swords and all seemed to be well, they knew in their hearts that the way forward would only get more treacherous and perilous.

description.0: "Calm down, my son. Listen, Mir. I am not your real father..."
description.1: "Noooooo!"
description.2: The once Minister of Imperial Banquets was, in truth, Khan the Asura from Jotunheim. Leaving the capital was but an act in collaboration with the Minister of Ceremonies and the Grand Secretary to protect the daughter of the Celestial Emperor.
description.3: "The late Celestial Emperor Shenxiao, the now Contra Mundi, was once a dear friend of mine. But now, knowing that you have successfully summoned her, all my wishes have been fulfilled."

description.0: "There are many among the military officials who wish to unseal Axis Mundi since the world in chaos would greatly elevate the position and importance of the Martial Artists."
description.1: "They want to wage another War of the Asuras?"
description.2: "He does."
description.3: The tug-of-war between the civil and military officials and the schemes of the past gods once again threatens all of the nine realms!

description.0: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.
A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.
A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.
A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

DiaryOfRoaldTheAdventurerQingxuPool.name: Diary of Roald the Adventurer: Qingxu Pool

description.0: Diary of a renowned adventurer, Roald. Spots of shiny green moss can be seen among the pages.
A clue found in the northern Guili Plains ruins: "To unite in ambition is to be steadfast and immovable for all time."
A censer used for burning incense.
Seven-Star Lamp
Letter left by Starsnatcher
A Mondstadt Hash Brown stuffed with chopped Philanemo Mushrooms. It's much tastier and more nutritious than the average hash brown.
description.1: They say a father who truly loved Mondstadt Hash Browns prepared these for his unborn son.

description.0: It's a berry that's been digested by a Dendro Slime. From the outside, it appears the same as any other ordinary berry. Will using it for herbal medicine really have any effect?
A thick blob of Hydro Slime Condensate. You can't help but get a strange sense of satisfaction while sloshing it in your hands. As for its taste...
A Windwheel Aster that's been through the gentle caress of an Anemo Slime. Although its appearance hasn't changed, faint puffs of air seem to escape between your fingers as you hold it in your hand.
A delicate fragment of carved stone. It seems to have something inscribed on it, perhaps only locals could decipher its exact meaning...
"...In the beginning, when the people assembled to farm the land..."
description.1: The transcript seems to be a record of some event...

description.0: "...and there they fought upon the Guili Plains, where black dust choked the heavens and a thousand rocks splintered..."
description.1: The transcript seems to be a record of a terrible war...

description.0: The hidden treasure of Mt. Qingce contains enormous Energy.
A list of lines from Ella Musk. On the front are many terms in Hilichurlian, and the back has some simple footnotes regarding the content...
An envelope that has been tightly sealed. Inside is a letter, inked characters, a Dandelion, love, and a wisp of hope. All these will be safely preserved inside until the seal is opened.
A gift that was recommended by Marjorie. It isn't very heavy; what kind of souvenirs could be packed inside?
A gift from Quinn. He mentioned that Beatrice helped him prepare it.
A special dish that Sara had specially made for Jilliana. What dish could it be? And what could be so special about it?
A package given from a traveling merchant to Huai'an, boss of the Wangshu Inn. There seems to be some gifts inside. It's heavy enough to pique your interest, but not so heavy as to make you worry.
A box containing invoices of goods. Common sense says that to avoid raising any suspicion, it's usually best to not open to open the box and take a peek.
A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that portrays an encounter between an unknown young boy and a spring fairy.
A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts the acquaintance of a spring fairy and a young boy.
A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a promise made between a spring fairy and a young boy.
A legendary tale passed down by Springvale hunters that recounts a bitter ending finally faced by a boy who was no longer young and a spring fairy who had not grown old.
A collection of poetry that Linling published at her own expense. It is her first publication, and she is very proud of it.
An invoice with information of goods recorded on it. With only a few simple goods listed on it, someone must have selected these items.
Some manifests of goods that has only had their numbers checked out. This may seem like a very simple job, but one must still focus in order to ensure that no mistakes are made.
Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
description.1: This species originally grew under complex hydrological conditions. Its foliage is abundant, its leaves are evergreen, and its stamen is as fair as a Golden House Maiden.

description.0: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
description.1: This variety originally grew in dark, damp locations. It is known for its profusion of petals, densely packed stamens, and powerful scent.

description.0: Silk Flowers from which perfume used in the Rite of Parting is made.
description.1: In the past, this strain would grow among cloud-ringed peaks. It is a reclusive species, and has a subtle yet enduring scent.

description.0: The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off a sweet scent.
The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an intense scent.
The essence of decocted Silk Flowers. It can be further refined into perfume. Gives off an elegant scent.
A light and empty box. It doesn't seem as though this fragile container has much protective ability...
A box containing cultural relics. Its ponderous weight makes one feel like it could break at any time...
A page of a book that has been soaked through in water. It must have been in there for a long time, as the words have become so smudged as to be illegible.
A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
description.1: It releases a scent that reminds one of sweet dreams. Perhaps it is the best fit for innocent young ladies.

description.0: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
description.1: It releases a thick, oppressive aroma. They say that it is very popular among the daughters of wealthy families.

description.0: A perfume decocted from a special breed of Silk Flower.
description.1: It releases a fragrance as elegant as the elusive, smoky mountain mist. One hears that it is a favorite of mature women.

description.0: A box that contains the gadgets Soraya gave to you. You can feel its weight in your hand. It should be able to satisfy the greed of certain people.
It is said that this magic bell was prepared specifically for adepti. Its sound rings through the air and does not fade quickly, and can be used to purify the mortal realm.
description.1: It seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...

description.0: Spare parts for the Guizhong Ballista that have been stored away since antiquity.
description.1: While they may seem like ordinary components, they have been made with special construction techniques, and to special design specifications.

ARecordOfQimingAndZhihuasConversation.name: A Record of Qiming and Zhihua's Conversation

description.0: A record of Qiming and Zhihua's conversation. It seems like banal passing of the buck, but it feels like there is some tacit understanding hidden within...

ARecordOfSisiAndChaoxisConversation.name: A Record of Sisi and Chaoxi's Conversation

description.0: A record of Sisi and Chaoxi's conversation. At first glance, the impression it makes is one of endless evasion, and of avoiding the brunt of work...

ARecordOfLittleMengLittleFeiAndLittleLul.name: A Record of Little Meng, Little Fei, and Little Lulu's Conversation

description.0: A record of Little Meng, Little Fei and Little Lulu's conversation. It appears to only be the straightforward conversation of children. But one can dimly sense some unnameable emotion sprouting in the hearts of the children. Perhaps this sprout will continue to gradually grow until its branches stretch out across the skies, no longer able to be ignored by anyone...
Norma's food order. You can feel its warmth in your hand.
A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Recital of Friendship is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...
A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Stirring Narrative is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...
A Hilichurlian poem created by Ella Musk. According to her, this Elegant Lyric Poem is the work of many hands. Still, you can't help but feel that something sounds a bit off when you read it...
A gift acquired from Vile. Given how heavy it is to hold, there must be quite a lot of items inside.
Cultural relics dug up by the Treasure Hoarders, and packed willy-nilly into a box. When you lift the box, it feels like it could collapse at any moment.
A seemingly ordinary container that had been trapped in amber. Its weight, once held, is astounding, and no matter what you do, you can't seem to open it...
A page that seems to have been forcibly torn out of a book. It has been soaked in water, and the words on it have become illegible.
A page with very messy handwriting. The words have been struck out with crude brushstrokes, and it has also been soaked in water to the point where nothing can be made out.
A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.
description.1: An ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

description.0: Funds provided by Childe. The clinking of the coins within lifts a person's spirits.
A trophy taken from a Mitachurl. It seems to be capable of producing a very loud sound, but that probably won't be enough to shake a certain group of people free of their arrogance.

A trophy taken from the Treasure Hoarders. This box is very small and isn't very heavy, and will not be able to contain the arrogance of certain people. But it should be more than enough to keep a lid on their tricks.

A trophy seized from a Ruin Guard. It does not appear to have much value as a collector's item. But it is heavy enough that it would cause a great deal of pain, were it to be dropped onto a certain arrogant someone's foot.
A traditional incense fit for the Rite of Parting, worth 2,990,000 Mora.
description.1: There are some things in this world whose value can only be appreciated by those who understand them. Perhaps Everlasting Incense is one such thing...?

description.0: A wooden plank well-suited to repair work. When people need repairs done, these things always come to mind.
A box with some leaves inside. Something feels unusual about it when you hold it in your hand, and you can't help but feel a little uneasy... can this box really contain these leaves?
A key carried by a Treasure Hoarder.
The treasure is buried beneath the <undefined>giant golden tree</undefined> in the middle of Lingju Pass.
Anonymous treasure acquired at Qingxu Pool. There is a pattern of unknown significance on the outside. Perhaps you could get someone in Liyue Harbor with an interest in antiques to take a look at it.
An unusual gemstone capable of removing a seal somewhere.
description.1: You can feel the turbulent thoughts racing relentlessly within when you hold it in your hand. Somewhere in this world are buried the memories of an ancient war.
description.2: "For a future without the pain of savage slaughter, for a future without lives lived in vain, for a future where every day is filled with peace..."

description.0: A ring that seems to have existed for a long time. Though it has become dull due to erosion over time, it is not dirty because it has been stored inside a box.
description.1: There are words engraved on the inside of the ring, still clearly legible:
description.2: "All beings suffer in war."

description.0: Around five paintbrushes of different lengths and widths, wrapped in a cloth and stored in a box. The artist clearly takes excellent care of them.
Half a box of paints of different colors. The bottle of white paint seems bigger than the others.

An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. For some reason, black and white are the only colors that he used. Vermeer says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <undefined>viewing spot</undefined> where he painted this work.
An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. He says that his lost paints and brushes are at the <undefined>viewing spot</undefined> where he painted this work.
A painting that Vermeer completed with the Traveler's help. He says that it is his finest work to date, but still far from perfect. He is determined to keep painting.
A circular stone with some text engraved on the side: "The house of stone envelops the timber hut." It seems like it should be fitted inside something...
The freshest Qingxin you ever saw. Just bursting with scent when you picked it. It probably needs some further processing before it's ready to brew, though.

An extra-special item from the Good Hunter menu. A durable and travel-ready reinvention of their Satisfying Salad, intended as a gift product. Despite this, the original flavor and texture apparently doesn't quite survive long journeys.
A bookmark given to you by Flora. Made from a dried-out Windwheel Aster, even in its box you barely notice the weight of it.

An extra-special beverage obtained from the Angel's Share. Claimed to be the most cool and refreshing beverage ever, one can certainly feel the wind at the back of the throat more keenly after consuming it.
A mint-scented perfume specially prepared for Little Lulu by Ying'er. It's the perfect scent for Lulu, Ying'er says.
Essential oil extracted from the Mint plant. Used for making perfume.
Crystal-clear, thick and gooey, like gelatine... Could this be the stuff of haute-cuisine dreams?
description.1: Apparently, very few people are actually willing to try eating slime, so derivative products are typically passed off as agar-based delicacies. Only die-hard food fanatics can taste the subtle difference between the two.

description.0: A plant with a rich, sweet fragrance that makes an excellent sweetener.
description.1: Some say plants have feelings too — show them enough care and attention, and they will strive to bloom all the more fragrantly. Sometimes, though, this will then make them the target of people who don't know how to mind their own business.

description.0: A Sweet Flower picked in the Whispering Woods. A decidedly healthy-looking specimen with a delightfully sweet aroma if you get close enough.
A Cecilia picked on Starsnatch Cliff. The whole plant still conveys a quiet sense of gentleness even outside of its natural habitat.
A Windwheel Aster picked at Windrise. The petals are still spinning merrily around. It seems the wind has imbued this plant with a healthy dose of vitality.
A small lamp grass obtained from the Whispering Woods. It has been unearthed with the utmost care, and neither its stem nor leaf has been bruised.
A cocktail ingredient salvaged from a cart. When you hold it in your hand, you can't help but feel that there's something unusual about it.
A very hefty bag of cash that Teucer was all too eager to offload onto you... One wonders what sort of family this Snezhnayan kid comes from.
