Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
description.1: This commonly encountered fibrous material can be processed into lantern wrappings so that the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

description.0: Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
description.1: The commonly encountered velvety material can be processed into lantern wicks so the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

description.0: Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
description.1: A mysterious shard of elemental rock that can float by itself. It is the secret to the flying lanterns. It is also said to be the thing that powers the Jade Chamber's floating mechanism.

description.0: It floats away carrying beautiful wishes. Can be crafted at a <undefined>Crafting Bench</undefined>.
Small crystals obtained from monster habitats on Dragonspine.
description.1: They are only generated at special times.

description.0: Pieces of crystal obtained from monster habitats on Dragonspine.
description.1: They are only generated at special times.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for Festering Desire.
description.1: This is the product of purifying Durin's vile venom, which has seeped into and spread throughout Dragonspine's ley lines. By using it on a bloodthirsty sword with a strong affinity for such materials, you can increase that sword's power.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for the Windblume Ode.
description.1: An intricately-made ornament that symbolizes the windmills and windblumes, and is that which adorns the limbs of the Windblume Ode. The wind is invisible and intangible, but the windmills that keep turning and the swaying flowers in the emerald fields are "the visible winds" that show people that the breeze will always care for all life in Mondstadt.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for "Dodoco Tales."
description.1: Pages scattered on the wind. Each one is filled to the brim with childlike wonder, and their dimensions are an exact match for "Dodoco Tales." The abundant innocence and pure love therein will never fade, and just like the never-ending adventure in the book — this passionate fairy tale shall forever soar in the wake of the author's footsteps.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for the Luxurious Sea-Lord.
description.1: The intense fragrance of this paste seems to have sealed the spirit of sea life within. Smear it on the Luxurious Sea-Lord to temper this unique claymore and make it harder still.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for "The Catch."
description.1: This was the favored liquor vessel of Ako Domeki, who once ruled over the Seirai region. The sea has brought it onto an angler's hook.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for the Cinnabar Spindle.
description.1: A silver substance shining with an otherworldly light that is a deadly corrosive poison to things of this world. And yet it also has the power to sublimate matter...

description.0: Specialized refinement material for the Oathsworn Eye.
description.1: Special Deep Sea Unagi oil, which was once used to maintain Enkanomiya's sacred artifacts, has been carefully processed for the purpose of making this shining eye most bright indeed.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for Fading Twilight.
description.1: Cor Lapis delicately refined by ancient arts practiced by the early inhabitants of The Chasm. It glimmers slightly with a light that resembles either the radiance of dawn or the dying twilight. Appearing in caverns where none may see either form of light, it must have brought some small comfort to those who fought against the dark enemy.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for "End of the Line."
description.1: Ointment refined from a catch from the great lake in the north. It has the effect of temporarily restoring the energy of the fish that could be made into fine bows.
description.2: It is said that in the lake dwell aquatic creatures that cannot be seen anywhere else in Teyvat.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for "Missive Windspear."
description.1: An ancient feather carved from turquoise. It was once used as an ornament or a token of sorts.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for "Toukabou Shigure."
description.1: A powdery substance meant to bind bamboo to an umbrella.
description.2: Even as the seasons change and the past dissolves, memory and thoughts will always remain, slumbering beneath an umbrella to rest in the shroud of a dream.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for "Mailed Flower."
description.1: Decorations can always provide a little something beyond an item's value and function. In times like these, an unwithering flower can lend some romantic essence to even a weapon.

description.0: Specialized refinement material for Ibis Piercer.
description.1: In the Great Red Sand, the youth who later became the King of Invokations was requested by the descendants of the Ibis King to spend a few days formulating bowstring wax from Sand Grease Pupae. However, the legendary bow disappeared along with the Ibis King, and only the recipe for making pupa wax was passed down from generation to generation. Perhaps it's still waiting for the day when it can be used again.

description.0: When a character initiates a Plunging Attack, they will unleash a shockwave that deals AoE DMG to opponents. This effect can be triggered once every 8s per character.

Continuous gliding or leaving the ground due to jumping will grant the current character a stack of Steelwing every 0.3s, up to a maximum of 3 stacks. When characters initiate Plunging Attacks, each Steelwing stack will increase the DMG of that attack by 35%. This will consume all the stacks of Steelwing that this character possesses.

When a character's Plunging Attack hits an opponent, it will generate Elemental Particles that regenerate 6 energy and an Anemo Amber that will generate a wind current. This effect can be triggered once per 8s, and this CD is shared between all characters in the party.
All party members' Plunging Attack DMG increased by 40%.

After characters use Charged Attacks to defeat opponents, the Charged Attacks of all characters in the party will be increased by 35% for 60s. Each of these effects can stack up to 5 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s.

If the current character is a bow user, hitting opponents' weak spots with Charged Attacks will grant the Ironbow effect, which will increase the CRIT Rate of Normal and Charged Attacks by 50% for 8s.

Defeating opponents with a character's Charged Attack will create a Vacuum Field that pulls nearby opponents in and deals DMG based on 500% of the character's ATK. This effect can be triggered once every 2s, and this effect's CD is shared between all characters in the party.
All party members' Charged Attack DMG increased by 30%.
Decreases all party members' Charged Attack Stamina consumption by 50%.

Characters possess 5 stacks of the Blade Dance effect, and each stack increases the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the character by 15%. Possessing 5 stacks will increase Normal ATK SPD by 15%. When a character takes DMG, they will lose 1 stack of Blade Dance. A maximum of 1 stack can be lost every second in this way. A character will gain one stack of Blade Dance for every 10s they are on the field, up to a maximum of 5 stacks. Each character's CDs, stack counts, and their effects are counted independently.

When a character protected by a shield hits an opponent with a Normal Attack, their ATK is increased by 10%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 8s. This effect, its stacks, and its duration are independently calculated for every character.
For 20s after an Elemental Burst is used, the character who unleashed that Elemental Burst has their Normal Attack DMG increased by 40%.
All party members' Normal Attack DMG increased by 30%.

When any party member uses an Elemental Burst, the Elemental Roundabout effect is generated, which increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 100 for 20s, stacking up to 3 times. If this effect is triggered again at 3 stacks, a shockwave that deals AoE DMG will be unleashed.
When Normal Attacks hit opponents, they have a 50% chance to regenerate 5 Energy for themselves. This effect can be triggered once every 4s per character.

For 8s after a character uses an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents have a 50% chance to generate an Elemental Particle that regenerates 2 Energy. Each character can generate this effect once every 1.7s.
Elemental Burst DMG dealt by all party members increased by 30%.

After using an Elemental Burst, all party members on the field will unleash one shockwave that scales on 600% of the ATK of the character that unleashed that shockwave, and which deals DMG to nearby opponents. This effect can occur once every 2s and its CD is shared between all characters in the party.
Increases the Elemental Burst Level of all party members by 1.
description.1: Maximum upgrade level is 15.

description.0: Elemental Skills will regenerate 8 Energy.
All party members' Energy Recharge increased by 30%.

When a character causes opponents to be Electro-Charged, there is a 50% chance to trigger a lightning strike that deals 500% of the triggering character's ATK as DMG and decreases the opponent's Electro RES by 25%. This effect can be triggered once every 5s and this CD is shared between all party members.

When a character hits an opponent with an Elemental Burst, a Hydro Amber that will create falling rain in an AoE when shattered will be generated. This effect can be triggered once every 6s and this CD is shared between all party members.
All characters in the party have their Elemental Mastery increased by 100.

When a character causes opponents to Superconduct, there is a 50% chance to trigger a falling icicle that deals 500% of the triggering character's ATK as DMG and decreases the opponent's Physical RES by 25% for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 5s and this CD is shared between all party members.
Character Normal and Charged Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo are increased by 30%.
All party members receive a 30% Physical DMG Bonus.

When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by a Geo Elemental Reaction, a small shockwave will be unleashed that will deal 500% of that character's ATK as DMG to nearby opponents. Additionally, all characters in the party gain a 40% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s after this effect is triggered. These effects can be triggered once every 5s and this CD is shared between all party members.
When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by a Geo Elemental Reaction, they gain a 30% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s.

When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by a Geo Elemental Reaction, they will regenerate 2 Energy for all members of the party. This effect can be triggered once every 2s and this CD is shared between all party members.
All party members' Shield Strength increased by 35%.

When a character hits opponents, a shockwave will be unleashed that deals AoE DMG. When characters are at full HP, the DMG dealt will be increased further. This effect can be triggered once every 5s per character.
While protected by a shield, characters gain a 40% incoming healing bonus.
Increases all party members' incoming healing bonus by 25%.

When a character's Charged Attacks hit an opponent that is under 30% HP, an executioner's blade will descend and deal immense DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 10s and this CD is shared between all party members.
When an opponent is defeated, it will release a shockwave that deals AoE DMG to other opponents.
During combat, when there are no more than 2 opponents near a character, ATK is increased by 20% and DEF increased by 20%.
A tiny piece of an Irminsul Fruit. You can almost feel a small amount of energy leaking out of its broken face.
A small piece of an Irminsul Fruit. You can somewhat feel the energy that flows gradually from its broken sections.
A sizable piece of an Irminsul Fruit. You can feel its broken edges brim over with restless power.

After using an Elemental Burst, the Elemental Profusion effect will occur, increasing all party members' Elemental Burst DMG by 12% for 15s. Max 5 stacks. When 5 stacks are possessed, Normal ATK SPD is increased by 15%.
When an active character triggers Electro-Charged, all of that player's party members' Elemental Burst CDs are decreased by 1s. This can occur once every 1.5s.

A rather pedestrian-looking wooden fishing rod. Apart from being quite sturdy, even to point where you could use it for self-defense, it lacks any sort of special features. But the old adage holds true — "the novice's rod shall be the tent-pole of their veterancy." Even the greatest of anglers must surely have started with this simple implement.

If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Mondstadt.
description.2: A long, bright, transparent rod created by a poet from Mondstadt. To help borrow the power of Anemo to help raise the rod, the poet rather ingeniously designed a fishing reel made from the leaves of Windwheel Asters, which also imparts a certain romanticism of "lingering in the wind" to this device. But perhaps there were issues in the handiwork or in the design itself, for the finalized product could not spin as freely as expected. Perhaps this is what they call "the chasm between professions?"

description.0: If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Liyue.
description.2: A long rod that stands like elegant bamboo. It is said to have been constructed and kept by a skilled hermit from Liyue, and it was first discovered on a stone tablet with the following words carved upon it: "O you who aspire, take up this rod," like a legendary sword waiting for a hero to pull it out. Of course, you only ever hear this glorious origin story from the mouths of merchants, so it may just be some rhetoric used to increase the item's value... But those who know this and still use this rod can only be those who are ready and willing to accept this pact.

description.0: If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Inazuma.
description.2: A rod created to commemorate the ancient Ukai, or Cormorant, fishing method. The ruby-red gem at the tip of the rod represents the tinder used by the cormorant fishers, and the bird ornaments along the rod's shaft represent the cormorants themselves, who helped the hard-working Inazumans pass through those cataclysmic years. This low-efficiency fishing method has long become obsolete, but the persevering, pioneering spirit has been passed down together with this rod.

description.0: If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle at an accelerating rate and increase your chances of success. If you leave the Ideal Tension Zone, the acceleration will reset.
description.1: A special fishing rod created for the sake of the Lunar Leviathan. To tackle this legendary fish, the creator of this rod specially added some material with rare functions onto the rod itself and the fishing line, giving it both great malleability and tensile strength. Of course, such a treasure could easily catch ordinary fish, but that seems like overkill to the point where even the rod might feel ashamed to be used thus.

description.0: If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Sumeru.
description.2: This archaic Sumeru fishing rod is carved like white jade, decorated with dark gold patterns, and embellished with green gems. Under its pure aesthetics, it seems to have some meaning related to "life" — it is said that the oldest fishing rod of Sumeru was a branch wrapped with vines, and many master anglers achieved miraculous catches with such rods. Today's fishermen also believe that such fishing rods with long histories will bring them good luck.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Welcome to Teyvat!"

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The most difficult part of writing a travel journal is coming up with the beginning.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "It's Baron Bunny!"

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Klee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Master Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: When Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: An hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: If you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Noelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A sign of recognition from Benny's Adventure Team.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Try saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Come watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: What should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: It was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: After all your wanderings throughout the world, do not forget the reason why you first set out.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: After mastering these skills, you may just find that you can get by just fine without engaging in battle. If you are without any commission to complete, that is.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Your hero's journey began before you knew it, but it's the experiences that really made it special.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Listen to the singing of Mondstadt's birds and winds.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Witness the lonely, cloud-covered peaks of Liyue.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Light can refract into countless colors, but people stop at seven because they're lazy to count. Perhaps the elements are like that, too.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Draw that bowstring taut!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Even if you're just going out to get a single dandelion, there will be obstacles in your path. But you love a challenge, don't you?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The deeper you delve, the more secrets you shall uncover.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The hilichurls were dubbed the "hill devils." But a certain young girl named Musk insists on calling them the "hill dwellers."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: You've heard many stories about Snezhnaya. What does it look like in your mind's eye?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: They say that storytellers love their cliffhangers — but you? You've heard it all before.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: We shall meet again someday.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: They say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Weighing anchor out to sea, one is wont to waver. But look to the skies, and the stars shall light the way."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: This was originally a peachwood sword made of ice. But a big enough ice block makes a better exorcist's tool than peachwood.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: That which awaits at the end of the challenges is...

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: So long as there is still desire left in your heart, when you hold your head high you will see that which glitters but is not light.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: All who have Kätzlein blood will have such feline features. An ancient prank played by a certain someone, perhaps?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Stars fall, light dims.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Xinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: This bears all the marks of that fellow who gallivants as he pleases across the continent with his ever-changing combat styles. Yet, his "Foul Legacy" was not originally his. Rather, it was taught to him by that solitary girl who dwelt in the darkest corners of the universe.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The name of the Honorary Knight has spread far and wide among the citizenry.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: They who have it in their hearts to bless others shall themselves be blessed.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Many boats have been numbered by day and night.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The peaks adorn the clouded moon.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Finally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A draconian peak must be scaled.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Do no harm to plant nor insect.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Allow me to bear witness to this miracle.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Remember to keep warm when setting foot on the mountain.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: We shall rise again — the tree of old has sprouted anew.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: My opponent for today seems to have an artistic temperament.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Director Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: When everyone's wishes are gathered together, they can light up the long night.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Every year on this day, the lanterns light up the night. May the fire never die, and may humanity endure.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: You claim to have seen all mechanisms, but have you ever considered playing yourself as a pawn?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Who has seen the wind? Neither you nor I. Nor has anyone ever seen love, till a bouquet comes flying by.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Excellent!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The universe does play host to just such a snake, whose scales glitter with precisely these colors.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: What knowledge might the fruit of wisdom bring, were it to descend upon the land? Either way, it'll taste good as a drink if left in Diona's hands.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: You can't see me. You can't see me.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Justice, signed in scarlet.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: How many nights have you spent with a stone for your pillow?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The days and months pass within the teapot.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: It's adventure time!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The world is wide under the eaves.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Imagine the vast expanse of a sea of stars. Imagine a one followed by a hundred zeros.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "In a land far, far away, there was a kingdom known as the Grand Alliance, and the people living there could throw ever-changing, quick, and powerful Kaboomballs."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Good omens must appear thrice for good fortune to come. One bows thrice at curtain call. The opponents to defeat number three.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Wherever the sakura petals fall, there the protection of the sacred tree rests.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The sakura of Mt. Yougou symbolizes the Grand Narukami Shrine.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Ayaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Even momentarily sparks can leave beautiful, unquenchable flames in the hearts of those who watch the night sky.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: It is even smaller than Sayu, sure, but it can help her do the things she doesn't want to do.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: This is the emblem of the Ogosho Shogun, and is the banner of her troops, the Electro Mitsudomoe.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: What encounters lie on the other side of this door?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A traveler shall experience ten thousand tales, and each shall form a part of the traveler's soul.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Our journey among the precipices.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Gather ye then soil from all corners of the universe, and from it may countless flowers grow.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Tenryou Commission's Kujou Clan.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A true grandmaster can see the board a thousand steps ahead.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Not simply Ei, and not merely the Raiden Shogun. Observe yourself also with one stormy eye, and you will someday reach a breakthrough.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Kujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Everything I do is in the service of life, not death."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: May the moonlight wash over you, O pursuer!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: This is the emblem of the Sangonomiya Clan, the leaders of Watatsumi's people.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Wait, if these fish can't be eaten, then why are we hammering these nails into fishhooks?" "Oh, you wouldn't understand."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: O stars and mountains above, listen to my song!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "I will ask you a question, and you shall answer me with your sword."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Blazing armor, flaming guards.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "You were not created to punish evil. But as to what your purpose is... I fear that I, too, do not know."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Pirka chikappo! Kapatcir kamuy!

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: As long as you believe in the path you are walking, then everything you encounter on your journey will be a source of happiness.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A real man puts sorrow and anger behind him and smiles brightly for the world to see!

description.0: Namecard.
description.1: Only this flower remains on the heights where all trees have withered.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The early onset of white hair is often correlated to one's sorrows. Since "comb" and "scatter" are similarly read in Liyue's language, they believe that combing one's hair is the same as scattering one's misfortunes.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Ms. Yun has two sorts of teachers. The critics of her onstage performances are one, and the books on rhyme she references while writing are the other.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "O Mighty Sun! What use are your heat and light if you cannot own all that they survey?"

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The luxurious colors flow past — all things are renewed.

description.0: Namecard.
description.1: There's a great many stories here, but no alcohol, so it's safe for Paimon to drink.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Where can Yae Miko's fox form be found? In your dreams, that's where.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The three realms quake, heaven and earth awaken. The Sangacorexes, too, rise again from their eternal slumber.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: What flows within this nameless, voiceless azure crystal? The secrets of the heavens? Or the whispers of the abyss?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Listen to the sound that comes from the clouds. That is its resentful rage, and its tiny wish.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Where once miners industriously delved and tunneled, now all is silent. Only the Glazed Sand Crystal and marrows of stone, both millennia-old, still give off any brilliance.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Those who share a hobby are known as a group as "fans." Best come up with those stories, everyone, before the kitsune editor-in-chief dreams up copyright law... Or perhaps she has already dreamed it up, but does not altogether mind?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Dice are always quite hard to make 'fair.' That goes double for dice with shoddier workmanship. The weighting on each numbered side will almost certainly be unbalanced."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden truly is frightening..."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Once upon a time, loyal souls did scatter east and west like swan geese." "Today I light my lantern, that they may not lose their way."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: A Temari of entwining strings in various colors. It must have taken someone's great effort to make such an item, yet Heizou only sees it as a simple game to untangle each string.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Years have gone by, and you wake from an old dream. Inside the keepsake shell, lingers the blue ocean of those summer days.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Tighnari takes good care of his big, fluffy tail. The essential oil he uses was extracted from flowers and mixed together meticulously. It gives off a faint, calming scent.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "I—It's Cuilein-Anbar! I, uh..."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: If you wipe the lamp she gave you and then scrub the Mora you gave her, no wish is unattainable... right?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Beneath the tranquil moon and inside the deep valley grows blooming roses. 'Tis a paradise with your presence.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Every journey and memory is a unique miracle that only belongs to the traveler.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: One day, our encounter at this moment shall shine like a star of reminiscence in our hearts.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: What dreams lie within the rich slumber of the stories deep in the woods?

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Behold everything the world has to offer; see through all that the sky's light surveys.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The wise, graced with the thorough knowledge of the truth, will not be sullied by sin. They are like the Nilotpala Lotus, which remains clear and pure even after the rains and winds have passed.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The years come and go. Only remembrance and the winds that return do not change.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Whenever Cyno falls into a profound silence, he must be considering some weighty judgment... Or perhaps he is simply considering something amusing.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The burning winds of the past ruffle the heron's feathers, but the bird has eyes only for the morning star at first light.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The lotus that blooms amidst the pure water is naught but a flash of light beneath her toes.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Anyone can play a tune that belongs just to them, and like the dew upon grass, can reflect the seven lights of heaven.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The sands subsume the tracks of travelers, and they await the day when a gust of wind will reveal gilded memories once more.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "A millennium of obsession and tragic yearning has long been lost in the sandstorms of those blazing nights. But the eternal verdant oasis of her dreams is, in all likelihood, as tender as it was at the first..."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The rising moon admires the sun, because her light can shine all over the earth. On the other hand, the setting sun is envious of the moon, for she can be accompanied by the sweetest of dreams.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "The starry sky in your dreams will illuminate your way forward, on the premise that the crystal in your heart reflects clear lights."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Traveler, there is no need to grieve, for the wind at dawn will blow the fungal spores carrying beautiful dreams to the fields that contain your hopes..."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: In a world most transient does the past hide, and in the whims of flowing flowers does thin snow abide.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "A—Anyway! Next time, remember to refer to me as Madam Faruzan before you ask a question! Seriously..."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "In this village, no one can defeat me!"

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Forgotten is the name of the ancient feast, scattered are the three rivers amongst a plumage of clouds, and across the curve of twilight does autumn yet linger.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "The only things researchers should abide by are debates and dialectics. Only by questioning everything at all times can one avoid falling into prejudice."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Can you guess which one here is Yuegui? That's right, all of them are!"

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The floating clouds dispersed to the thousand peaks at dawn.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: With magnificent sunglow sheds light on the night sky, chimes are orchestrated to celebrate the bygone year. The gilded palaces are adorned with beaded curtains, the railings painted silver by bright moonlight, and the feasts brimmed with jolly singing and dances. Is that flowers or fireworks? A wealth of instruments plays in unison, harmonious and pleasant.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The endless sandstorm conceals ancient dreams...

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Those that should be burned will be reduced to fly ash, so that all the precious things that should be preserved can be revealed.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Every time he holds the map he illustrated in his hands, the boy feels like he is holding a small piece of rubbing of this world.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: It is said that experiencing true love is like seeing a ghost. Most folks speak of both as hearsay, but true witnesses remain few and far between. That said, since even ghosts can manifest here, perhaps true love is also waiting right around the next corner.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Sincerity begets longevity.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "When conceptualizing architecture, there is nothing wrong with imagining that the structure we build will surmount the firmament and outlast the stars."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Oh, Khvarena in your endless forms, protect this imperiled land. The blights and glories of the earthly realm are naught but the illusion of existing seeds."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "I will forget the flowers of yesteryear, the daylight, the rain. I ask that you remember in my stead, in this nascent world, and hold to that lost dream."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "The time to flourish has yet to come. Hide me with care between the blades of grass and beneath the tallness of trees. Let me linger in that place of dreams."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: The ancient Amrita Pool is suffused with recollections of times past. Perhaps it also contains the power that will create the future.

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "Knowledge serves as the crown of time, and reminiscence is bound to the time we shared as one."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: "To Kirara, the smiles on her customers' faces are the best rewards possible."

description.0: Namecard style.
description.1: Never forget the time you once spent with games and good friends. Never forget what it feels like to have no worries about the future.

description.0: Namecard style
description.1: Who knows? Perhaps the phantasmal light that only exists on the other side of this transparent glass can ever so slightly brighten up the world on this one.

description.0: A stone that can be used in Mondstadt to search for nearby Anemoculi.
description.1: This man-made stone plate possesses a certain characteristic similar to that of the Anemo Statues of The Seven, giving it the power to resonate with Anemoculi.
description.2: Oculus Resonance Stones are crude imitations of the Statues of The Seven constructed by the ancients. But it is precisely this crudeness that makes them crave the power of elemental oculi, thus providing devout worshippers and adventurers alike a prime opportunity to collect oculi.

description.0: A stone that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby Geoculi.
description.1: This exquisite stone plate imitates a certain mysterious quality of the Geo Statues of The Seven, causing it to lead people to the location of Geoculi.
description.2: Elemental Oculi represent the lost power of the Statues of The Seven — perhaps offering this power back to the statues also has significance for the lands that the gods watch over.

description.0: A compass that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby chests.
description.1: The land of Geo is rich with valuable resources, with treasures hidden throughout the mountains and wilderness just waiting to be found.

description.0: A bottle that is able to hold Anemograna and use their energy to generate wind currents.
description.1: This item was designed by Knights of Favonius scholars to help the Knights on their scouting expeditions and travels by affording them the ability to better use the blessings of the Anemo God.
description.2: In order to take advantage of its wind currents with a wind glider, however, you technically need a gliding license — this has prevented it from becoming widely used, at least legally anyway.

description.0: Use this to create a temporary Teleport Waypoint at your current location. Only one can exist at a time.
description.1: A pocket-sized item that creates a temporary Teleport Waypoint. It is capable of connecting with the ley lines, at least to the extent necessary to bring about teleportation.
description.2: Although it offers an incredible convenience to Vision bearers, the actual principles behind Teleport Waypoints are not yet fully understood. We can only hope that using them does not cause any undesirable side effects...

description.0: A portable stove that can be quickly set up for cooking in the environment. If you enter into combat nearby, it will be destroyed.
description.1: Liyue's terrain is vast, varied, and at times even inhospitable — and yet all its inhabitants share a love of good food. These two phenomena would not be able to coexist were it not for portable cooking equipment like this. Whether you are scaling the heights of Jueyun Karst or exploring the islets of Guyun Stone Forest, bringing a portable stove means that a delicious and freshly cooked hot meal is always available at a moment's notice.

description.0: You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
description.1: Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
description.2: Crystal filled with immense energy.
description.3: The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

description.0: A handy meal-in-a-pouch that can transform most foods into instantly absorbable nutritional matter. Despite the fact that it can greatly increase the efficiency of nutritional intake, most knights aren't too keen to put their food in it...
A compass that can be used in Mondstadt to search for nearby chests.
description.1: The needle of the Treasure Compass doesn't spin according to the world's magnetic field, but rather follows the energy of ley lines to lead the user to treasure.

description.0: A small and special Seelie, particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
description.1: A companion entrusted to you by Ulman. Seelie are naturally inclined to guide people, though this Seelie seems weaker than usual, and possesses a remarkable obsession with Iron Coins...

description.0: A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
description.1: A miniature sea-blue Seelie. Unlike other Seelie, it does not serve to guide others, but to follow them to see the world.

description.0: A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
description.1: A miniature powder-pink Seelie. Though it cannot say a word, it will silently follow a traveler that strikes its fancy around the world.

description.0: A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
description.1: A miniature golden Seelie. It gives off a feeling very similar to that of Mora. They say that Seelie of this color represent good fortune.

description.0: Upon use, emits heat for a short period over a small area, diminishing the effect of Sheer Cold.
description.1: Warming Seelie have evolved in response to the extreme change in temperature to give the comfort of warmth to those who seek it. This convenient gadget was originally crafted by those who struggled to survive in the snowy mountains in imitation of such evolved Seelie.

description.0: A convenient tool that records and saves images upon use.
description.1: A special item from Fontaine that can record images. People and places to remember must come aplenty for a Traveler roaming the world.

description.0: Use this during the "Five Flushes of Fortune" event to store images of objects with a specific color.
description.1: Ji Tong imported this new-fangled Kamera model from Fontaine, but it doesn't seem to work quite as he'd hoped...

description.0: When used, this useful gadget can save and store the scenery before it and add a special color tone to it.
description.1: A strange device from Fontaine that will not only record sceneries but will also add special colors to the printed images. This design was made in response to "The Steambird"'s request for a Kamera that could not only reflect the environment, but also the emotions of the one taking the picture. Unfortunately, the final product could not quite match their specifications.

description.0: A device that can transmute materials placed within and convert it into some other material.
1: During the transmutation process, you must use <undefined>Elemental Attacks</undefined> to generate enough energy for the transmutation to take place.
After obtaining the transmuted materials, you must wait seven days to use it once again.
description.3: This mysterious device, discovered within the ruins, has the power to accelerate cycles and "transmute" material objects. Generally speaking, everything is undergoing a cycle. Memories and elements surge within the ley lines, rotten fallen fruits return to the soil, and the trees born from the soil will one day bear their crystalline fruit...

description.0: A strange Lochfolk larva, filled with curiosity about the world at large.
description.1: Lochfolk specialize in shifting into watery shapes and can meld with other water bodies to synchronize emotions and knowledge alike. Endora is still small, and Endora is very curious. Endora can spit out bubbles to meld with other beings of water, through which she shall learn everything.

description.0: Just a very curious Lochfolk who only wishes to see the world. Might actually get along very well with Mini Seelie: Dayflower, but please do not meld them together, thank you.
Use this to release a balloon that can be popped.
description.1: Balloons have special significance in the land of the wind, for they represent the freedom to drift with the wind. Of course, air pressure will destroy balloons once they've reached a certain height.

description.0: Use this traditional instrument from Mondstadt to play songs.
description.1: An instrument of incredible workmanship, it will surely produce moving music when played by able hands.
description.2: Mondstadt has a long-standing tradition of poetry and song, and thus also boasts a long history of constructing instruments to that effect. Bards are most proud of their songs and poems, and perhaps the instruments, too, would be proud of their owners and their musical tradition.

description.0: A teapot obtained from Madame Ping. There seems to be a whole new realm within it...
A harpastum made from pure bird feathers and strong fabric. Perhaps it contains some strange power...
A toolbox filled with all manner of items that can be used to repair the damage done to a Waverider.
1: Restores 50% of a Waverider's structural integrity.

description.0: A Harpastum Bomb with a comfortable weight that makes it easy to control and throw accurately. It can deal a large amount of Pyro DMG to a single opponent.
A Harpastum Bomb of cunning design that sends fragments flying every which way when it explodes, dealing a certain amount of Pyro DMG over a wide AoE.

A Harpastum Bomb brimming with Pyro energy. When unleashed, it will burst into violent flame, dealing a small amount of Pyro DMG over a small AoE. It is extraordinarily effective against Cryo shields.
A stone that can be used in Inazuma to search for nearby Electroculi.
description.1: This strange device can resonate with Electro Statues of The Seven. Due to this trait, it can detect the presence of Electroculi.
description.2: Across the span of endless years, even the most majestic cities and sculptures would be worn down by wind and rain, and even the power of Statues of The Seven would gradually dissipate. But this faded strength would coalesce once more into the Oculi, which call out wordlessly to their Statues.

description.0: A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"... That is to say, it can create the seeds of various plants according to their special traits, which can then be planted within the appropriate fields within your Serenitea Pot.
description.1: Plants available for planting: Silk Flower, Sweet Flower, Cecilia, Glaze Lily, Windwheel Aster, Qingxin, Violetgrass, Valberry, Small Lamp Grass, Jueyun Chili, Carrot, Radish, Mint, Mushroom, Naku Weed, Horsetail, Snapdragon, Lotus Head, Calla Lily, Seagrass, Sea Ganoderma, Harra Fruit, Zaytun Peach, Sumeru Rose.

description.0: A handy tool used to locate nearby chests in Inazuma.
description.1: The land of the thundering archipelago has suffered a great many past hurts. The many treasure chests that dot the islands are a symbol of its revival from these wounds.

description.0: Use this to increase Gliding Movement SPD by 30% for 30s.
description.2: This item possesses some sort of mysterious power. In the hands of the tengu warriors, it can have various effects, but in the hands of an ordinary person, it can still have enough power to "make one's body lighter" while in mid-air.

description.0: A mysterious lens. If you view small fox statues with this lens, you can find things that were not there before.
description.1: They say that in the distant past, the legendary Kitsune Saiguu left a catalyst for the then-Hiiragi Clan head, Hiroshi, as a tool to be used in exorcisms.
description.2: The Hiiragis would have a special Kamera made to order from overseas with that catalyst mounted on its lens assembly, before giving it back to the Grand Narukami Shrine as a symbol of their friendship.

description.0: A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
description.1: A miniature purple Seelie. Its color is very similar to that of Electro-infused items. Who knows if you might get a little tingle from poking it...

description.0: A handy tool that the researcher Ayesha created on the side while researching ancient relics. It can be used to detect such ancient relics buried underground. Due to its hasty production, however, its accuracy could stand to be improved. Users should beware that some unexpected things may occur while using this gadget...
A net that has been modified once again by Wakamurasaki using onmyoudou. She claims that it can detain the essence of small creatures before using the net itself as a medium to recreate their forms.
A musical instrument that can be used in performances.
description.1: It is made of rather unique materials, and its craftsmanship is quite different from the designs that are currently in vogue. An unpredictable strength has been woven into the ethereal strings that can even allow it to cause the illusions within the heart of its player to surface.
description.2: There is an old adage in Liyue: "the longer one's eye of the flower drinks, the deeper one's heart into the mire sinks." It seems that only the strong-willed may use this instrument.

description.0: A gift from Shiki Taishou: a replica armed with spiritual power. Though Shiki Koshou is incapable of charm magic, it is in contact with Shiki Taishou at all times and can share all that it has seen and heard with him, so it's almost like you've still got Shiki Taishou with you on your journey.

A friend of Sango's used Kamuna Onmyoudou in a fit of inspiration to create this convenient little gadget. It is not powerful enough to capture criminals, but with a little aim, capturing little animals should be a cinch.

A special device created by the artisan Pengyi. It comes with functions that allow for the creation and automated launch of fireworks. In the hands of someone creative, it will surely see great use in the creation of unique and radiant fireworks shows.
When equipped in The Chasm's Underground Mines, this precious crystal can provide illumination.
description.2: It has many similarities to the Glazed Sand Crystal that may only be found within The Chasm, but it stores even greater power within it.
description.3: May it be as a sun in your palm, lighting the way through the lightless tunnels and bringing comfort where all is dark.

description.0: Use this to clear a certain area in Enkanomiya of the darkness' influence.
description.1: The name "Bokuso" is formed from "boku," meaning "to draw near to what is good," and "so," meaning "to shun that which is tainted."

description.0: A musical instrument that can be used in performances.
description.1: A small drum that Itto gave you. He bought it from an outlander merchant, and while it does look quite normal, it is said to be a relic left behind by an ancient and powerful onmyouji who used it to drive out calamity and pray for blessings.
description.2: It would cost an ordinary person a large sum if they were to wish to possess this, but the price may be negotiated if one has some connection to the drum.
description.3: And wouldn't you know it? An 8,000,000 Mora treasure was eventually purchased for 80,000. What a steal for Itto, eh?

description.0: A collection device created by Bertrand, a manufacturer of machines. It can sequentially collect materials required for creating other products. When hooked up to the Great Machine, it will pour the source materials into the latter and start the process of creating robotic furnishings.
Equip it to utilize the power of Aranara.
description.1: "Fatty fruit, bitter fruit."
description.2: A temporary home for Aranara memories. Kusava makes Aranara strong.

description.0: Arama handed this book over to you.
description.1: It seems to have witnessed the passage of many years. By the look of things, someone used to keep records in it, but none of that can be retrieved now.
description.2: Use it to document your shared adventure with Arama.

description.0: A box for cards released by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Only beginners who have learned the basic rules and are verified as players can collect one.
description.1: They say that these boxes were made by researchers from the Sumeru Akademiya, and that they feature a special mechanism that can be used to detect nearby people who also possess Caskets of Tomes.
description.2: Use this function to engage in more matches against nearby players!

description.0: A stone that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby Dendroculi.
description.1: A curious amulet of a similar nature to the Dendro Statues of The Seven. By the same token, it is drawn to Dendroculi.
description.2: In the world, there are grass and trees, vines and flowers — living beings of Dendro Element that abound in diverse shapes and forms. Though differing in appearance and various other aspects, they were born from the same land and will return to the same land.

description.0: A compass that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby chests.
description.1: For some people, the significance of life lies in exploration and discovery. Upon reaching each destination, there is always bountiful treasure awaiting.

description.0: A talisman that can help collect wood.
description.1: Talismans of this kind are often seen in the forests in Sumeru. They possess the ability to gather the power of grass and trees.
description.2: To prevent the erosion of the forest and, in darker times, to resist the invasion of vicious monsters, trees and vines would form impregnable shelters together. Those who held "the Boon of the Elder Tree" were recognized by the forest as its friends and thus gained unfettered access to walk amidst the forest under the guidance of streams and moonlight. But that is archaic lore from a long, long time ago.

description.0: A gadget that improves the efficiency of food processing by consuming minerals.
description.1: Young Akademiya researchers are accustomed to cooking with their experimental instruments. Someone invented an "Ultra-Hot Burner Lamp" that utilizes the energy of minerals to juice up the heat, all the better to save time and increase cooking efficiency.
description.2: The one you have is a test model for civilian use with power constraints and a dimmer flame, which should reduce its fire hazard rating. Even so, this convenient gadget is still perfectly capable of cooking jam and drying sausages with ease.

description.0: A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
description.1: A miniature green Seelie. It becomes most happy indeed when it gets close to a tree.

description.0: A Kamera that Razi borrowed from Lord Sangemah Bay. It will come in handy when you take photos of beautiful scenery, look for inspiration in the wilderness, or wish to keep festive memories!
description.1: This Kamera is adorned with metal decorations and thus looks a lot more expensive than regular Kameras. Be careful with it!
description.2: According to the leasing agreement, it can only be used within Sumeru's borders.

description.0: In some cosmological settings, this is a staff filled with mystical power. It can resonate with the Future Stars and show the way to them.
description.1: Of course, in some other settings, it might be an object kept in storage by an organization known as the Akademiya, and perhaps its recorded name might even be Ayesha's Chaos Prospector. There is a thin layer of dust over this object due to a long period of disuse.

description.0: A self-adaptive tension stabilizer that can be installed on a fishing rod to facilitate fishing. The device can automatically detect and record how hard different fish struggle. The more data it collects, the better the stabilizer works.
description.2: The device's prototype was the pointless invention of a Fontaine inventor that drew little interest for the longest time until the Fontaine Fishing Association discovered it and modified the product into the fishing line stabilizer used today. When the device first came out, it was most warmly received by the Association members, and now it has gradually been promoted in other regions.
description.3: It is an exceptionally hot commodity in the Snezhnayan market. Word has it that one of the Lord Harbingers is particularly fond of the product, which explains the hype.

description.0: Use this traditional instrument from Mondstadt to play songs. It may work wonders when played in the forests of Sumeru.
description.1: A vintage lyre borrowed from Amadhiah in Vimara Village.
description.2: Mondstadt has a long-standing tradition of poetry and song. Bards from there tend to address their instruments as "Friend" or "Partner." Thus, one of them trusting Amadhiah with the instrument was nothing less than a gesture of intimacy and trust.

description.0: A party popper that, when used, unleashes streamers and confetti.
description.1: "Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend and fish blasting companion! But if Klee brings Jumpy Dumpty to the festival, Master Jean will be angry... Don't you worry, though! Jumpy Dumpty has gained a new ability with Albedo's help! Just pull on its tail, and beautiful colored strips will come flying out!"

description.0: This object has long been the subject of Akademiya Researcher Tirzad's research. Its etchings and craftsmanship indicate that it is a relic of King Deshret's civilization. It seems to have the power to command devices within ruins associated with King Deshret...
When used, this useful gadget can save and store the scenery before it and add a special color tone to it.
description.1: A strange device of unknown origin. The photos it takes have a peculiar effect. Who would've thought that a machine with no water inside could produce photos with jovial bubbles in them that lend them a sense of fantasy?
description.2: A certain Cavalry Captain once described this machine as being able to "capture people's desire for cool and refreshing days."

JinniInTheMagicBottleLiloupar.name: Jinni in the Magic Bottle — Liloupar

description.0: Born from water lilies, Liloupar, the great Jinni, whose soul had been shattered due to an ancient punishment, was sealed in a transparent magic bottle.
description.1: Now, it seems that she has found a new master...
description.3: Although she only possesses a-hundred-millionth of her previous great power, she will use what is left of her to help her master pass through the hot sand and ancient ruins of the Desert of Hadramaveth.

description.0: A crucial item provided by the organizer of the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament. Use it to capture, accommodate, and command intelligent Fungi. Word has it that it was invented by a researcher named Kautilya. Only those who can wield this item skillfully are qualified to participate in the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament. That said, you cannot help but feel that some of this item's functions create a strong sense of déjà vu...
Made from stacked paper, this lightweight device has the appearance of a bird, and fittingly, was given to you by Cloud Retainer.
description.1: While it may be called a "device," you cannot see any traditional mechanical components here — well, not from the outside, anyway.
description.2: It seems that this adeptus' skills as a mechanist have improved even further...

description.0: A special compass obtained from the Adventurers' Guild. According to certain rumors, it might just offer you a sprinkle of extra luck...
As one of the Pari, the defenders of the land, Sorush aspires to become a Bloomguard who shall quell calamity.
description.1: Having formed a connection with one whom she trusts, Sorush now traverses the defiled land alongside her Yasnapati...

description.0: The Kamera you borrowed from Fassben. Be careful when using it. You don't want to break it, now...
A musical instrument that can be used in performances.
description.1: A drum with a clear sound and unique design. It has an exquisite exterior and features intricate craftsmanship. High-quality materials have been used in its construction, with a view toward sound quality during performances, intonation and long-term wear and tear.
description.2: It is said that this small drum combines an Inazuman traditional instrument with some quirks of drums from other nations. When it plays certain tunes, it can even bring people good luck...

description.0: A "Search Compass" made to find relic replicas. As this device was adapted from one used to survey elemental energies, the localized elements present might disrupt its attempts to scan for those replicas...
A marvelous crystal with spots of radiance that seems to be able to sense joyous emotions in a certain radius around it and lead people in the corresponding direction.
description.1: Use this to find Joyeux Vouchers in a set AoE.

description.0: A marvelous crystal within which radiance flows like a river. It seems to be able to sense joyous emotions in a vast area and lead people in the corresponding direction.
description.1: Use this to find all Joyeux Vouchers within the Veluriyam Mirage.

description.0: A mirror-type gadget made by the Amurta researcher Lamiya. It can be linked to the animals' devices, which will reflect the animals' points of view in the mirror.
Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Anemoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Anemoculi.
Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Geoculi.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Geo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Liyue.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Wind Catcher. A Wind Catcher can absorb the energy of Anemograna and release it when needed to create a wind current.
Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Portable Waypoint. With a Portable Waypoint, you can create a teleport waypoint wherever in the world you want.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Adepti Seeker's Stove. Learn it and you can create a portable stove to bring with you on your travels.

Detailed step-by-step instructions for making Condensed Resin. Using resin in this condensed form to activate certain Ley Line Blossoms and Petrified Trees will increase your efficiency. You can hold no more than 5 Condensed Resin at a time.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Nutrition, Ready-to-Eat (NRE) meal-in-a-pouch. Learn it and you can create a tool that makes ingesting food much quicker.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Anemo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Mondstadt.
Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Snow-Tombed Starsilver (Claymore).
Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Frostbearer (Catalyst).
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dragonspine Spear (Polearm).
The Saimon Clan possessed this diagram of how to make the Amenoma Kageuchi (Sword). You can use it to master the art of making this weapon.
Someone from Tatarasuna left this diagram of Katsuragikiri Nagamasa behind. You can use it to master the art of making this Claymore.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Kitain Cross Spear (Polearm).
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Hamayumi.
Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Warming Bottle. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to resist Sheer Cold.
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the claymore "Forest Regalia."
description.2: This tale is about the Forest King.
description.3: "The forest used to be a giant maze many, many moons ago..."

description.0: Through this tale, you can master the method to make the sword "Sapwood Blade."
description.2: This tale is about a friend lost in the desert.
description.3: "This is a story from Valuka..."

description.0: Through this tale, you can master the method to make the bow "King's Squire."
description.2: This tale is about a girl lost in the forest maze.
description.3: "Once upon a time, there was a princess..."

description.0: Through this tale, you can master the method to make the polearm "Moonpiercer."
description.2: This tale is about moonlight and magic.
description.3: "This story is about all the children who are fascinated by the moonlight..."

description.0: Through this tale, you can master the method to make the catalyst "Fruit of Fulfillment."
description.2: This tale is about portents and disasters.
description.3: "In truth, the moon did not always look like a pearl..."

description.0: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Electroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Electroculi.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Electro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Inazuma.
A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fruit Paste Bait.
A detailed step-by-step formula for making Redrot Bait.
A detailed step-by-step formula for making False Worm Bait.
A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fake Fly Bait.
A detailed step-by-step formula for making Sugardew Bait.
Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Dendroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Dendroculi.
A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dendro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Sumeru.
A prayer plaque that displays lovely Inazuman scenery, carved upon exquisite Yumemiru Wood in full color.
description.1: You can use Sub-Space Creation to imprint this elegant scene upon your Serenitea Pot...

description.0: This fruit, brought as a memento from Sumeru by the Teapot Traveling Salesman Chubby, gives off a truly marvelous fragrance.
description.1: Even a whiff of this fruit brings certain images to mind, which you can manipulate via the power of Sub-Space Creation to recreate the wondrous sights of Sumeru in your Realm Within...

TheMountainCloudsLetDownGoldenRain.name: The Mountain Clouds Let Down Golden Rain

description.0: A classic "cloud blue" firework that will display its inner-and-outer-segmented design after exploding in mid-air like a profusely-blooming flower.

TheSilverNightIsFullOfStars.name: The Silver Night is Full of Stars

description.0: A classic "starry-night"-colored firework. Sure to be an magnificent, unforgettable sight.

TheGloomPaintsTheColdBlooms.name: The Gloom Paints the Cold Blooms

description.0: A classic firework the color of the azure skies just after rain. Its flaming flower glows when released, displaying unique petal morphologies.

FireworksDanceAmidstASnowySky.name: Fireworks Dance Amidst a Snowy Sky

description.0: These gorgeous golden fireworks follow a particularly graceful trajectory after they ascend and are quite silent, though no less lovely for it.
These calendula-colored classics will spin like windmills after being released and are most beauteous indeed.

KindledTreesByTheMoonlitWindow.name: Kindled Trees by the Moonlit Window

description.0: After being released, these fireworks rain down flames like willow leaves and branches. It is said that the very edges of these flames can touch the window frames of the tallest buildings, granting a most unique viewing experience.

An Anemo Slime-shaped creation. However, its creator considered calling it an "Anemo Slime-something" just a little odd, thus using the name of a similarly-colored local snack, "Villosa Balls," instead.
After visiting a neighboring state, a certain firework artisan from Liyue met a friendly and hospitable Spark Knight, and thus created this firework based on her bestest friend, Dodoco.

FameAndFortuneForASeason.name: Fame and Fortune For a Season

description.0: A firework that explodes in the shape of Mora. Some say that if you view this from just the right angle, your fortunes for the year shall be assured.

After visiting a neighboring state, a certain firework artisan from Liyue went on an unforgettable journey with a certain adventure team leader, thus basing this explosion's design off his favored gesture.
A firework that explodes in the shape of heart. Some say that if you view this from just the right angle, your love life for the year shall be blessed.

A firework based on the little helper for the Wanmin Restaurant's famous chef. When anyone from Liyue sees this little helper, their thoughts will immediately turn to good food. And where there's a festival, there must be good food!

BetweenTheExquisiteThrowsOfHerEnigmaticD.name: Between the Exquisite Throws of Her Enigmatic Dice

description.0: A dice-shaped firework that displays a different number each time it is set off. It is said to be a gift from a firework artisan intending to show their respect for the Yanshang Teahouse's new owner. Since she took over the place, almost all the problem gamblers have disappeared. The game of cards no longer has anything to do with Mora, instead returning to its original and purest form — ordinary leisure-time amusement.

A traveling novelist was once warmly welcomed by a pointy-eared General during their stay in Watatsumi Island. The General's little canine companion left a deep impression on them, and so they commissioned an artisan to craft this firework.

CliffbreakersBannerFluttersInDrumRolls.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner Flutters in Drum Rolls

description.0: A firework meticulously designed by an opera-loving firework artisan. It explodes in the shape of the banners often seen in opera performances. Watching operas is a favorite pastime among many Liyue locals, and when fireworks with this pattern bloom in the sky, an unforgettable melody sung by a certain famed performer is sure to come to mind...

A firework commissioned by a merchant who often traveled between Liyue and Mondstadt. This firework is said to be a token of gratitude for a certain bartender, for it was after being deeply struck by her words that the merchant stopped their excessive drinking and made a great fortune.
A firework that explodes in the shape of a Floating Hydro Fungus.
description.1: They say that a Ministry of Civil Affairs clerk offered the inspiration for this rotund firework pattern after returning from a business trip in Sumeru, hoping that its adorable appearance would brighten everyone's heart.

description.0: A firework inspired by a warmhearted little girl.
description.1: Many people have received a helping hand from the girl, yet none know her name — all they know is that she called her companion "Yuegui." This firework was commissioned as an expression of their gratitude and well wishes.

description.0: A card for the tabletop game, Genius Invokation TCG. It is built tough, and some special printing method has been used for the illustration on the card's face, resulting in a truly exquisite appearance.

A card for the tabletop game, Genius Invokation TCG. It is built tough, and some special printing method has been used for the illustration on the card's face, resulting in a truly exquisite appearance.
